parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the hybrid brake system can cause the loss of braking power, leading to accidents or near-miss situations, which can result in injuries or fatalities.
symptoms: brake pedal goes to the floor
ABS and brake warning lights illuminate
and failure to slow down or stop the vehicle.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the ABS module can cause the loss of anti-lock braking functionality, leading to wheel lockup and loss of vehicle control, which can result in accidents or near-miss situations.
The failure of the HCU can cause the loss of braking power, leading to accidents or near-miss situations, which can result in injuries or fatalities.
symptoms: brake pedal goes to the floor
ABS and brake warning lights illuminate
and failure to slow down or stop the vehicle.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the hybrid propulsion system can cause the vehicle to shut down suddenly, resulting in a stall-like condition, which can increase the risk of a crash.
symptoms: The vehicle shuts down without warning
the dash reads "Stop Safely Now" or "Pull Over Safely Now"
the vehicle is unable to restart right away
the vehicle restarts after a short period of time but shuts down again.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the motor electronics coolant pump can cause the hybrid electronics system to overheat, resulting in the powertrain shutting down and increasing the risk of a crash.
symptoms: The vehicle shuts down without warning
the dash reads "Stop Safely Now" or "Pull Over Safely Now"
the vehicle is unable to restart right away
the vehicle restarts after a short period of time but shuts down again.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The sudden loss of power steering can cause the vehicle to become difficult to control, especially at high speeds or in tight turns, which can lead to accidents or loss of vehicle control.
symptoms: The power steering fails or becomes difficult to turn
the wrench icon appears on the dashboard
an error message stating "Service Power Steering" appears on the dashboard
the vehicle becomes hard to steer

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the hybrid powertrain system can cause the vehicle to lose power, stall, or shut down unexpectedly, leading to safety risks, accidents, and inconvenience to the driver.
symptoms: the master vehicle electrical hazard warning lamp is displayed
the vehicle will not move or accelerates slowly

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the MECP pump can cause the vehicle to stall, leading to safety risks and accidents.
symptoms: the dash error message refers to a MECP pump
and the vehicle requires replacement of the MECP pump.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the throttle body can cause the vehicle to lose power, stall, or shut down unexpectedly, leading to safety risks, accidents, and inconvenience to the driver.
symptoms: and the throttle body requires replacement.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the hybrid battery cooling system can cause the vehicle to lose power, stall, or shut down unexpectedly, leading to safety risks, accidents, and inconvenience to the driver.
symptoms: and the hybrid battery cooling system requires replacement or repair.
